title: What are the top 10 Eddie Van Halen guitar solos? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is really a matter of personal taste and opinion. My top 10 EVH solos: EruptionOne Foot Out the DoorIce Cream ManCathedralHot for TeacherSpanish FlyBeat ItBlack and BluePleasure DomeI’m on Fire

This is strictly subjective - so each person might have a different opinion. But my top Ten would be: (1)- Eruption (2)- Spanish Fly (3)- I’m the One (4)- Somebody Get Me A Doctor (5)- Ice Cream Man (6)- Summer Nights (7)- Baluchitherium (8)- Pleasure Dome (9)- 5150 (10)- Beat It.
